titleStmt.title: A new ballad of the souldier and Peggy. To a new northerne tune.
titleStmt.author: Crimsal, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: For F. Coules dwelling in the Old-Baily.,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Richard Crimsal. Cf. STC.
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
